name: Particularly small game console
description:
This is a very, very small mini game.

Your operation will affect several game consoles. If one of the game consoles is GameOver, then you are GameOver!

Want to say

If it goes well, in later versions, the games in each console you control will be different!

Imagine if these three game-consoles operate together: Snake, Mario, Sokoban! It's so cool!

 

At present, the game is still under development. There is a preliminary demo that you can try.

Supports English language and Chinese language.

Welcome to play~ Also look forward to your feedback~
